attributes.action: Stop handing out knighthoods, CBE's, OBE's and MBE's to celebrities and honour 'normal' people as well
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: When ever you pick up a newspaper there is another story about a famous person who has been given an OBE, etc for their work to charity. How many people do you know who have done work for charities, etc and do not get recognised? How many people are risking their lives at the moment for us in Iraq, Afghanistan...? If 'normal' people are getting knighthoods, etc then no-one knows about it as they don't get mentioned in the papers. Let's make them realise that just because they may not be famous, people would still like to be recognised for their dedication

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with the Cabinet Office: http://www.honours.gov.uk/
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
